overview: "I shot this in 1989 on Rapa Nui, with a wind-up 16mm Bolex camera. Finished 2 years later with a lot of help from my friends, especially Wil Wardwell, Stan & Kim Carroll, Ron Bahara, John Shourt, Bob Koehler, and Dave Hunter. After another 20-odd years, Victor Otero and Brother Cleve helped me do the digital thing. MƒÅuru-uru!"  Jury Award, NY Short Film Expo Golden Eagle C.I.N.E. Awards
title: The Secret Of Easter Island
